channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-38267|2024-05-24T14:40:36.381Z -- IBM -- Security Verify Access Docker
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 260584.

item.title: CVE-2023-38267|2024-05-24T14:40:36.381Z -- IBM -- Security Verify Access Appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 260584.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-05-24T12:01:02.658Z -- IBM -- Security Guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.
